stimulusHtml: What is the kinetic energy of the rock just before it hits the ground?

features.html: A rock of mass m is thrown horizontally off a building from a height h, as shown above. The speed of the rock as it leaves the thrower's hand at the edge of the building is vo

choicesHtml: 1 2   m v 0 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EE7@

1 2   m v 0 2 − m g h MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42A9@

1 2   m v 0 2 + m g h MathType@MTEF@5@5@@429E@
